name: Proof 362 — Sharing Northern Sausage and Sticky Rice
description:
This proof records a daily life moment at MaMeeFarm on 20 December 2025 at 08:24 (GMT+7).

The image shows a simple northern Thai meal consisting of sai ua (northern sausage) and sticky rice, purchased from the village and brought back to the farm. The food is shared between two people, reflecting everyday subsistence, food culture, and communal living within MaMeeFarm.

This record documents food consumption as part of real-world daily operations, connecting physical movement (walking to the village), local economy, and household nutrition. The scene is captured as-is, without staging, with a visible timestamp to ensure temporal traceability.

This proof contributes to the DGCP continuous record by preserving ordinary but essential human activities eating, sharing, and sustaining daily life.
